评论详情: I like the way it fits!!

评论概述: The sleeves are blue not black
评论详情: Cute shirt, comfy but cheep material.
This shirt is very thin. It also runs a size small. If you buy this shirt you need to be attentive to what you wear under it.
It’s so soft true to size but it is a little cropped so it shows your belly button but I love it it is so soft and comfortable

At age 41, it’s hard to believe that “Y2K” is now a trending style. Still not totally sure I understand all aspects of the style but this shirt is very cute. My daughter is 5’3” and weighs about 110 lbs. She bought this shirt in size S and it fits well.

I accidentally ordered a large and was going to return it but I tried it on and like how it fit loose. It’s really soft and the colors are just like the photos. It seems pretty fitted so if I got my normal size (small) it wouldn’t be baggy/loose. Washed it and it didn’t shrink either. I think it’s high quality for the price and worth getting!
Very cheap material, very thin. Not worth the cost.
Soft, true to size, wrinkles easy, thin material
I really like this top. I just wish the arms were a little longer. Otherwise it’s a good long cropped length and it’s really soft and comfortable. Hang dry only.

i love the color and material of this shirt. it is very stretchy and comfortable. the only thing i didn't like about it was that there isn't a tag, so figuring out which side is the front is tricky, and i end up putting it on backwards.
very cheap and thin. Doesnt feel good on the skin or flatter anyone with a tummy since the material holds onto all the wrong places.
Not flattering, very tight , cheap fabric . I returned it
Soft, stretchy, good material, holds a few washes, not see through
small and snug like the picture, but I would say shorter than the picture.

This shirt is very cute and the fabric is high quality. The shirt fits perfectly. However, it took about 3 weeks to arrive and the color was wrong. I ordered Black sleeves but they came in dark grey. Very cute top but i wish it was in the color i wanted .
Shorter than what the picture looks like.

评论概述: Sizes are weird and sent the wrong product
评论详情: I’m conflicted with this review because while I love the shirts, the sizes are all wrong and I got sent the wrong color. I ordered the black sleeve shirt in both large and extra large. The shirt labeled large (black sleeve) is bigger than the extra large (grey sleeve)?? Also, the second shirt has gray sleeves instead of black. Other than those two issues, the shirts fit nicely and are super soft and comfortable.

I wrote a review awhile ago saying how much I love this shirt. I just ordered a new one in one size bigger and what came was disappointing. It took almost a full month to get here and is was the wrong color. I got a medium, but it fits the same way my old one fits. My old one is a size small. I haven’t stretched it out because I don’t wear it often and I washed it only about 3-4 times. Unless they stretch out easily but I don’t think that’s the case.

Firsts I buy the gray one that are very cute and the material are cotton that’s why I buy another one in brown color with green but this one are very different at the picture the color doesn’t looks at the picture and the material are so different because this one it’s nylon not cotton like the first one that y buy .. if u want  a buy one buy 1 or 2 sizes up because run small . But Still liked

This feels so soft and light on the skin it's easily wearable throughout the day! that being said it does fit a tiny bit smaller than expected and if you stretch the material it's not going to look very flattering so I would make sure to get the correct size or maybe even go a size up than normal because this is going to grip ya

This shirt is better quality than I expected it to be. It’s very comfortable, stretchy, and it looks exactly like the photos! I also love that it’s not too cropped so it still reaches down to my jeans, and it’s not too thick so you can wear it year round. Just be sure to look at the sizing chart because I’m normally a small, but I had to order a large because of the measurements.
I absolutely love this shirt.  It is so cute and looks exactly like the picture.  The fabric is soft and stretchy so that it can fit your form without being too tight.  I recommend!
